actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
House Committee on Armed Services Discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution Agreed to in House (Amended) by Yea-Nay Vote: 401 - 0 (Record Vote No: 473).

official_title: A resolution to express the sentiment of Congress regarding the deaths of members of the 101st Air Assault Division in an airplane crash on December 12, 1985, at Gander, Newfoundland, Canada, while en route home for the season's holidays.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended, roll call #473 (401-0)) Expresses the sympathy and sentiment of the House of Representatives regarding the deaths of members of the 101st Air Assault Division in the airplane crash at Gander, Newfoundland, Canada.

titles.title: A resolution to express the sentiment of Congress regarding the deaths of members of the 101st Air Assault Division in an airplane crash on December 12, 1985, at Gander, Newfoundland, Canada, while en route home for the season's holidays.
